text: @techinsider this is a worthwhile watch & RT for those of you how do not have the actual facts about #COVID19 as 99% of folk I speak with seem to be completely misinformed and "make up" their own weird and ridiculous views & opinions on what is a rather serious matter (yea humans, go figure)
